official_title: Assessing the Acceptability of the Use of a Mobile Health App Among Young Adult Female Survivors of Childhood Cancer: A Feasibility Study
inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 30 Years
miscellaneous_criteria:
Inclusion criteria are females who:

* Have been diagnosed with cancer before the age of 18 years
* Are between the ages 18 to 30 years
* Have been off treatment for at least six months
* Have a personal smart device to use for the app
